agriutilities

The goal of this package is to provide some additional functions for the analysis of field trials in agriculture using packages such as SpATS, lme4 and ASReml-R.

Installation

You can install the development version of agriutilities as is shown below:

devtools::install_github("AparicioJohan/agriutilities")

or

remotes::install_github("AparicioJohan/agriutilities")

Example

This is a basic example:

library(agriutilities)
## basic example code
